name: Building Block Cities - Fire Copter Drills
name_original: Building Block Cities - Fire Copter Drills
description: This game includes two major parts: building a city scene using the given building blocks and finishing fire copter drills on the scene. Initially, an example city scene is included in the game. Players can build their own city scenes by editing this example. The building blocks can be assembled by matching color-coded faces on the blocks. Waypoint gates (also a type of the given building blocks) should be included in a city scene, and these gates can be connected to form a closed loop. This loop is for fire copter drills just like racetracks are for car races. A drill is finished after the fire copter flies through all waypoint gates (three laps of the loop).
